title: Mastery 6-7
body: So im trying to get mastery 6-7 on my first champion, 24 boxes 20 skin shards 2 champion shards two ward shards... why didnt you just put a riot point price for mastery 6-7

replies.body:
because being able to buy mastery 6 and 7 would defeat the purpose of having them.
they're supposed to show that you're not just an average x champ player, you're above the rest.

Are you kidding me they are already making you buy it.

You can only get 4 chests MAX a month, most likely 2 if you keep on top of it, keys are very rare, and you need a champion permanent, a shard, or 500 essence for 6. Don't act like "that would defeat the purpose". Riot it making you pay for a little banner above your head and on your profile.

Maybe you are above the rest but pay to get mastery levels doesn't mean shit.

Yeah it would be the equivalent of "can i pay to be world champion?". 

NO. Skills or gtfo.

I need one more champ shard to get my 7 but yeah I bet their purchasable champ shards won't come in for like 5 patches and when they do will cost a really bullshit amount of ip and a small amount of rp to convince people to just buy rp

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/champion-mastery-levels-6-and-7-live-now

"Because loot has some RNG elements to finding champ shards and permanents, we’re working on a way to pick up only champ shards for IP or RP. We’re aiming to have it up within the next patch or two. "
